select hall_no as hallNo, code as code, hall_name as hallName, hall_price as hallPrice, hall_tel as hallTel, hall_addr as hallAddr, hall_tag as hallTag, hall_path as hallPath from hall
where hall_loc like '%'||#{hallLoc}||'%'

select dress_no as dressNo, code as code, dress_rent_price as dressRentPrice, dress_tel as dressTel, dress_addr as dressAddr, dress_tag as dressTag, dress_filepath as dressFilepath from dress
where dress_loc like '%'||#{weddingLoc}||'%'
